name: Punch Your Boss and Press the REVOLT Button
name_original: Punch Your Boss and Press the REVOLT Button
description:
Wander around a club before opening. Talk to your colleagues. Start a Revolution.

A short game.

  • 12 Exciting characters to talk to and interact with
  • Literally dozens of lines of dialogue
  • Experience the ennui of the service industry
  • Punch your boss
  • Press the REVOLT button
  • 4+ minutes of Public Domain Clair De Lune
  • Probably some typos
  • Presented in glorious 640x480 resolution

Controls

  • WASD = Move
  • Mouse = Look
  • E = Talk to people
  • LMB = Interact with colleagues/Punch Your Boss/Press REVOLT Button
  • ESC = Quit
